# init(rectangleOf:)

**Initializer**

Creates a rectangular physics body centered on the owning node’s origin.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rectangleOf s: CGSize)
```

## Parameters

- **s**: The size of the rectangle.

## Return Value

A new volume-based physics body.

## Creating a Body from a Shape

- **init(circleOfRadius:)**: Creates a circular physics body centered on the owning node’s origin.
- **init(circleOfRadius:center:)**: Creates a circular physics body centered on an arbitrary point.
- **init(rectangleOf:center:)**: Creates a rectangular physics body centered on an arbitrary point.
- **init(polygonFrom:)**: Creates a polygonal physics body.
